instructions: Tap Settings > Security . Tap Unknown Sources . Tap OK .

On your phone's web browser, go to https://apkpure.com/ Search for "Showbox." Showbox used to also be referred to as Showbox Lite or Showbox HD. Now, the app is solely known as Showbox. Tap Download APK and wait for the file to download. The speed will vary depending on your internet connection. Tap Open . Tap Install . Tap Done . You've successfully installed Showbox.

Open the Showbox app to immediately browse movie news. Tap the hamburger menu icon to bring up other options. Tap Movies to browse the movies available on the service. Tap the picture of the movie to open a preview. Tap Watch Now to watch it.
